CURRENCY CONVERSION API

Use this API to get exchange rates between different currencies.

APIs Available:

  • /api/convert/?date={date}&from_currency={from_currency}&to_currency={to_currency} - Get the exchange rate from one currency to another for a specific date.
  • /api/convert/?date={date}&from_currency={from_currency} - Get the exchange rates from one currency to all other currencies for a specific date.
